name: Text Tower Defense
description:
This is my Lundum Dare 41 submission!

Game Info: (This is in the game window as well!)

- In Text Tower Defense your goal is to build towers to defeat enemies. Try to reach wave 20!

- If you lose a life, you lose some money. If you lose 5 lives, the game is over!

- To buy a tower select the tower button, then select a position on the map and click twice.

- All towers have to wait a cooldown period after they fire.

- Towers cannot be deleted after being placed!

- B is the beginning of the path, E is the end.

Extra Info:  (You really don't need to read this, unless you are confused)

- Defeating enemies gives you money.

- Towers cannot be purchased during a wave.

- 1x, 2x, and 4x are game speed controls.

- Towers cannot be placed on other towers or the path.

- Towers can be canceled by clicking somewhere else on the screen.
